divs: Sighting DetailsHi, my son took this photo on his i-phone when flying out of Heathrow Airport on July 14th 2011 on way to Atlanta, USA. He didn't actually notice the craft at the time as he was just taking a snap out of the window shortly after take off.The craft must have been seen by crew or passengers. I can supply more details if you are interested. Thanks, Keith
Summary: you can see in the photo
